TABLE.NAME: block_exaquest_similarity
TABLE.COMMENT: This table is used as persistence store for the gtn-jku-similarity-comparison extension, see https://gitea.swerk.priv.at/stefan/gtn-jku-similarity-comparison

FIELD.NAME: question_id1
FIELD.COMMENT: The first question ID for the similarity comparison (foreign key).

FIELD.NAME: question_id2
FIELD.COMMENT: The second question id for the similarity comparison

FIELD.NAME: is_similar
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean value, 0 <=> not similar, 1<=> is similar

FIELD.NAME: timestamp_calculation
FIELD.COMMENT: The UNIX timestamp when this similarity value was calculated.

FIELD.NAME: threshold
FIELD.COMMENT: The threshold/cutoff value for determining similarity, range [0.0 - 1.0]

FIELD.NAME: algorithm
FIELD.COMMENT: The similarity algorithm or metric that was utilized for computing the similarity distance.

KEY.NAME: fk_questionid_1
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the first question ID.

KEY.NAME: fk_questionid_2
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the second question ID.
